name: nas-knowledge-graph-demo
description: Interactive visualization of NAS (Network Attached Storage) knowledge relationships

scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e:headless && npm run test:performance
scripts.qa: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e:headless
scripts.qa:full: npm run lint && npm run test:all && npm run test:cross-browser
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run docs:api && vite build
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run docs:api && vite build
scripts.build:qa: npm run qa && npm run docs:api && npm run build
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.lighthouse: npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --output=html --output-path=lighthouse-report.html
scripts.perf:audit: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && node scripts/lighthouse-audit.js http://localhost:4173
scripts.perf:audit:dev: npm run dev & sleep 5 && node scripts/lighthouse-audit.js http://localhost:5173

author: NAS Knowledge Graph Demo
